thread.title: Dell Curry nails a 30-footer in a suit to show Steph he isn’t the only shooter in the family
thread.title_full: Dell Curry nails a 30-footer in a suit to show Steph he isn’t the only shooter in the family

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Dell Curry nails a 30-footer in a suit to show Steph he isn’t the only shooter in the family
text:
Like father, like son
This is your friendly reminder that Dell Curry was pretty freaking good at basketball in his day too. Stephen Curry threw the ball at his dad to be funny and Dell was like, “nah, just gonna shoot this and show you how it’s done.” At least that’s what I imagine happened. Here it is. 
Steph... to DELL... for THREE!! pic.twitter.com/1W9lroCF4O 
— CSN Warriors News (@CSNWarriors) February 2, 2017 Curry is currently a color commentator for the Charlotte Hornets ’ television broadcasts. This is also an excuse to share the best picture of Steph and Dell.
